TopicTitle: HST-S and HST-L Truss segments mass incorrect.

Articles.Content:
The MST S & L are 0.1 & 0.2 tons. The LST S & L are 0.12 & 0.480 tons. Meanwhile the HST S & L are both 7.2 tons. This is compared to the regular full truss's Where L is 0.22 for S and 0.88 for long while the XL is .4 & 1.6. 

The HST S should possibly be .35t while the HST L should be .7t? (Assuming a number was just transposed in the large and coped to the small)

This also jives with the truss currently being almost 3x the mass of the XL cargo bay, while the shorter truss segments are all significantly lighter than their cargo bay variants.
